content: stranded knitting 8 sts per round and purl the row after the you will need to loop the working yarn around increase row in this way you can make an the carried yarns about every two stitches so adult hat if you desire you don t have big loops on the back row 1 p around in main color row 2 p10 add black p 20 with blue p 10 purl across sts on other needle row 3 p 12 add black p 16 with blue p 12 purl across other needle row 4 p 14 add black p 12 with blue p 14 purl acorss other needle row 5 p 15 add black p 10 with blue p 15 purl across other needle row 6 p 16 add black p 8 with blue p 16 purl across other needle row 7-17 p main color all around cut black yarn and weave in ribbing do a p2 k2 ribbing for as long as you desire it to be bind off very loosely
